execution_plan.description: Get ids of goods that are flavor 'apple' and food 'pie' (goods.id).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE flavor = 'apple' AND food = 'pie';

execution_plan.description: Get receipt numbers from receipts where the customer id is 12.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber FROM receipts WHERE CustomerId = 12;

execution_plan.description: Get distinct receipt numbers from the items table where the item corresponds to the apple-flavor pies found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);
